message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you and I'm willing to part with it for $14,500. What do you think?
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $13,000. I really like the product, but I'm on a tight budget. Can you meet me at $13,000?
I understand you're on a budget, Bob, but $13,000 is cutting it too close to my bottom line. How about we meet in the middle at $13,750?
I appreciate the compromise, but I'm still a bit short on funds. I'm willing to go up to $13,500. Can you meet me there?
